name: Hurricane chase(飓风追击)
description:
One day in the future, a terrorist organization code-named Apocalypse hijacked a scientist from a climate laboratory to create countless weather controllers to create tornadoes around the world in an attempt to rule the world.
In order to eliminate the threat of weather controllers, countries selected military elites to destroy weather controllers. At the same time, there are some victims of weather controller experiments, adventurers, chasers and other people with different purposes also go to these areas.
Hurricane chase is a multiplayer (4vs1) Sports game where one player takes on the role of the Tornado, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to destroy the weather controllers or attack the Tornado and avoid being destroyed.
